```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(patchwork)

data("penguins")
```

I think I'm going to do counts across years?

```{r}
penguin_counts <- penguins %>% 
  group_by(year, island, species) %>% 
  summarize(counts = length(year))
  
biscoe <- ggplot(penguin_counts %>% filter(island == "Biscoe"), aes(x = as.factor(year), y = counts)) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = as.factor(year), xend = as.factor(year), y = 0, yend = counts)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = species), size = 2) +
  facet_wrap(~species)
biscoe

torgersen <- ggplot(penguin_counts %>% filter(island == "Torgersen"), aes(x = as.factor(year), y = counts)) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = as.factor(year), xend = as.factor(year), y = 0, yend = counts)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = species), size = 2)
torgersen

dream <- ggplot(penguin_counts %>% filter(island == "Dream"), aes(x = as.factor(year), y = counts)) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = as.factor(year), xend = as.factor(year), y = 0, yend = counts)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = species), size = 2) +
  facet_wrap(~species)
dream

grid <- biscoe / 
  (torgersen + plot_spacer()) / 
  dream + 
  plot_layout(heights = c(1, 2, 1))
grid
```

```{r}
penguin_counts_island <- penguins %>% 
  group_by(year, species) %>% 
  summarize(counts = length(species))

ggplot(penguin_counts_island, aes(x = as.numeric(year), y = counts)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = species)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = species))
```
